result.title: Wrong Answer Need Help
result.content:
Hi I faces wrong answer a lot of time for this Problem:

http://acm.tju.edu.cn/toj/showp1549.html

Please Help me by identifying my wrongs.

Here is my Code:

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

inline int fact(int n)
{
    int i, res = 1;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    res *=i;
    return res;
}

int main()
{
    int fac[10];
    fac[0]=1;
    for(int i = 1; i<=9; i++)
        fac[i] = fact(i);
    cout.precision(10);
    cout<<"n"<<' '<<"e"<<endl
        <<"- -----------"<<endl;
        for(int i=0;i<=9;i++)
        {
            double res = 0;
            for(int p = 0; p<=i; p++)
            res += (double)1/(double)fac[p];
            cout<<i<<' '<<res<<endl;
           
        }
        return 0;
}
